about_the_game:
SEKTORI [DEMO VERSION]

Sektori is an intense, fast paced twin-stick shooter infused with hard hitting techno music. Choose your upgrades carefully and create powerful builds to take on the relentless enemies and epic bosses on a constantly evolving battlefield. Sektori is a game that requires your complete focus, a game where the high-adrenaline visuals, music, and gameplay come together to transport you into another state of consciousness.

Simple, pure gameplay. Quick runs. Lots of challenge and replayability.

DEVELOPER NOTES

Hi, I'm Kimmo and I'm the developer of this game (with my brother doing the soundtrack). With Sektori I wanted to create a shoot'em up where every run feels familiar, but is still completely unique. A game of skill, not memorization. The hand crafted attack waves, levels and even the bosses are combined and randomized and layered with the upgrade systems in a way that creates an interesting challenge for every run. The aestethics of the game are very much inspired by techno music. Fast, detailed, colorful, saturated, intense, aggressive.

Dive in and take on the challenge as it comes and have fun!

name: Sektori Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4+ Ghz, 4+ core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
